TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mexico, title = Mexico, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexico} }

S.FORM: Mexico hya' ga cyux maki' tay 23 00 N, 102 00 W na pemeco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,964,375 sq km (maki' tay 14ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,943,945 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 20,430 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 123,166,749. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 54.90% , lhlahuy hya' ga 33.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 11.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Mexico City. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 16 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Enrique Peña Nieto, aring ryax 1 squ byacing tay 12 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Mexico hya' ga cyox maki' tay 23 00 N, 102 00 W na pemeco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,964,375 sq km (maki' tay 14ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,943,945 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 20,430 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 123,166,749. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 54.90% , lhlahoy hya' ga 33.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 11.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Mexico City. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 16 na tay mqiro' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Enriqoe Peña Nieto, aring ryax 1 sqo byacing tay 12 sa kawas 2012 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
